Title: The Nude Body Case in Tokyo
Actors: Hui-Shan Yang, Te-Kai Liu, Sha Ma
Plot: Learning of childhood friend Meihua's death, Lingling goes to Japan to find Meihua's sister, Meifeng. Brutal gangsters demand Lingling return an item Meihua stole, and hold Meifeng hostage. Old friends help Lingling confront the g...
